title: National Aviation Heritage Area: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes          The National Aviation Heritage Area is comprised of many sites.  While some sites are free of charge to the public, others may have entrance fees and/or event or participation fees.  Please check on the specific National Aviation Heritage Area site prior to your visit. You can also visit the National Aviation Heritage Alliances' website for more comprehensive information about each site.
